      • addIncomingMessageListener

        public void addIncomingMessageListener(DHT.IncomingMessageListener l)
        Listeners must be threadsafe, non-blocking and exception-free and avoid modifying the passed messages or their contents. They are invoked from the message-processing threads, so any incorrect behavior may prevent the messages from being processed properly. registration itself is not thread-safe, thus listeners should be registered between creation of the DHT instance and invocation of its start() method.

      • createPeerLookup

        public PeerLookupTask createPeerLookup(byte[] info_hash)
        returns a non-enqueued task for further configuration. or zero if the request cannot be serviced. use the task-manager to actually start the task.
        Specified by:

      • bootstrap

        public void bootstrap()
        Initiates a Bootstrap. This function bootstraps with router.bittorrent.com if there are less than 10 Peers in the routing table. If there are more then a lookup on our own ID is initiated. If the either Task is finished than it will try to fill the Buckets.
